alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:25PM CDT until April 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Western McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 415 PM CDT/315 PM MDT/. * At 325 PM CDT/225 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Swan Lake, or 16 miles northeast of Arthur, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Three Mile Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Schnick Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 177 and 203. Highway 97 between mile markers 32 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
